name: Beyond Hanwell Teaser: The Royal Hallamshire
name_original: Beyond Hanwell Teaser: The Royal Hallamshire
description:
Beyond Hanwell: The Royal Hallamshire

Head through the gates of The Royal Hallamshire and discover it's secrets. A hospital far beyond the borough of Hanwell, The Royal Hallamshire is a standalone teaser to the upcoming psychological/survival horror Beyond Hanwell.

  • Dual control melee combat system, land each hit and combo with satisfying intensity.
  • Play your own your own way, non linear open gameplay makes for a unique experience. With multiple ways to complete the location.
  • Immersive. All player feedback is displayed in game, with no HUD whatsoever to keep you immersed and the tension high.


Explore a dynamic environment. Play through The Royal Hallamshire multiple times and discover new ways to finish the location with their secrets.


We're trying to create an effortless control scheme, navigate the environment naturally with minimal tutorial.


The Royal Hallamshire is dense, detailed and atmospheric, explore, search, scavenge and survive.


Interact with the world in various ways, use the environment to take out enemies or open up new paths to discover.


Dual combat system and environmental blocks. Open up different paths based on what you have available at the time.
